summary: Customer needs to update email address due to job change
suggested_reply: I'd be happy to help you update your email address. Since you still have access to your old email, I've just sent a verification link to old@company.com. Click the link and follow the prompts to update to your new email. Don't worry - your project history, settings, and all data will remain intact during this change. The process takes about 2 minutes to complete.
